typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		tTravelHistory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HealthData
todayrecords1 derive(concern = case(tSymptoms == 'Yes', 'Yes',tSeenDoc == 'Yes', 'Yes', tRisks == 'Yes', 'Yes', tTemperature >= 38.00, 'Yes', tTravelHistory == 'Yes', 'Yes','No')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(tID!='')) ~> AlterRow1
HealthData filter(tReadDate > minus(toDate('2020-12-14'), 1)) ~> todayrecords1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		Concern as string,
		tTravelHistory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['tID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tID,
		tWorkplaceID,
		tReadDate,
		tReadTime,
		tTemperature,
		tSymptoms,
		tRisks,
		tSeenDoc,
		tCreateDateTime,
		Concern = concern,
		tTravelHistory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
